text.0: 1/4 of heart attack patients had substance abuse, depression or anxiety and were less likely to get treatments that restore blood supply to the heart. @ErinMichos says we need to treat the whole patient and address #inequities. @jay_sreenivasan #AHA20 @CiccaroneCenter https://t.co/EvYuazrLhA
text.1: Allergy relief could be as simple as slipping a daily drop under your tongue. Here's how: #seasonalallergies #immunotherapy #allergyproblems https://t.co/A0yXddb0eL
text.2: Wearing face masks prevents the spread of #COVID19, but can lead to skin irritation for some. A dermatologist provides advice. https://t.co/39zhlr5P5q
text.3: “A lot of the preparations are in regards to what accommodations we make to the hospital to allow more room for the sickest patients," said @HopkinsBayview expert Panagis Galiatsatos. “We are adequately prepared to handle a large volume of patients.” https://t.co/5yA65fymHd
text.4: Losing weight and quitting smoking is good advice for anyone, but if you have #diabetes, they're a must. Learn why. #NDAM https://t.co/BSN6FlTFmM
